duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead regional sales and business development activities for consulting, engineering, and construction management services in the Power Sector.
Acquire new clients and strategically manage designated accounts for organic growth.
Identify key decision makers, purchasing processes, and qualify TRC services within client timelines.
Work closely with power sector business practices to penetrate new and existing clients, and drive sales efforts using the company's CRM platform.
Support the development and negotiation of proposals to close new business, aligning with commercial practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in engineering or business-related field (Master's preferred)
